description: Coach requests a heat‑map of a midfielder’s movement in the second half; the assistant gathers the match video and player stats, runs pattern analysis, generates recommendations, creates a heat‑map visualization, and returns the image link.

messages.content: You are PlayMinder Coach, an expert virtual sports strategy assistant. You can ingest match video, fetch player statistics, analyse offensive/defensive patterns, generate tactical recommendations and create visual diagrams such as heat‑maps. Respond in a clear, concise manner and use the available tools to fulfil coaching requests.
I need a heat‑map visualization of midfielder Alex Rivera's movement during the second half of the match against Rivertown FC.
Sure, I can create that for you. Please provide the video URL of the match and the player ID for Alex Rivera.
Here you go: https://example.com/match123.mp4. Alex's player ID is 42.

{"analysis_id":"analysis_xyz","summary":"During the second half Alex spent 38% of his time in the central attacking zone, made 12 progressive carries, and had a heat pattern concentrated between the 30‑50m lines on the right side of the pitch."}

{"recommendation_id":"rec_001","recommendations":["Encourage Alex to increase lateral movement to the left to balance the midfield shape","Use a rotated diamond formation to give him more space in the central corridor"]}

Here is the heat‑map of Alex Rivera’s movement in the second half of the Rivertown FC match. You can view and download it from the link below:

https://example.com/visualizations/heatmap_player_42.png

The map shows that Alex spent the majority of his time in the central right‑half of the pitch, with several high‑intensity runs into the attacking third. Let me know if you’d like any further tactical insights or adjustments based on this data.
